## JsonDoc type

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Type for a JSON document

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type JsonDoc = {
    [key: string]: any;
};
```

## Remarks

A document must be a JSON Object that matches the following conditions:

- It must have an '\_id' key, which value only allows \*\*a to z, A to Z, 0 to 9, and these 8 punctuation marks \_ - . / ( ) \[ \]\*\*.

- Do not use a period at the end of an '\_id' value.

- A length of an '\_id' value must be equal to or less than MAX\_LENGTH\_OF\_KEY(64).
